h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister
content: When you're ready to move to the next area, jump into the pit, only to find yourself taking a one way trip down to the true **Webbed Hollow** of this realm.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister'.
The content is as follows:
When you're ready to move to the next area, jump into the pit, only to find yourself taking a one way trip down to the true **Webbed Hollow** of this realm.
